author: Nick Perry
title: Bleak figures from China and US show economic hit from virus
description: BEIJING (AP) — Bleak figures from the world's two largest economies underscore how quickly the coronavirus is delivering a massive economic blow. China  on Friday reported GDP shrank 6.8%...
content:
BEIJING (AP) Bleak figures from the worlds two largest economies underscore how quickly the coronavirus is delivering a massive economic blow.
China on Friday reported GDP shrank 6.8% from a year ago in the quarter ending March, its worst contraction since b… [+6357 chars]
